sentence.Network_en: An iterative method Ishikawa iteration and solve perturbed equations of accretive operators.

sentence.Network_en: A lower price should also make deal earnings accretive sooner than the current 2013 - 2014 time frame.

sentence.Network_en: This paper shows that lower semicontinuous accretive and monotone operators T cannot be multivalued.
sentence.Network_cn: 证明下半连续增生和单调映射不可是多值的.
